comment._content:
Hi, Thanks for your comment - I'm glad that you like the image. This  one is really special and I can't help but thinking that the background looks like a set as the stones don't look real in my opinion. 
What do you think?

comment.author: 13656547@N02
comment._content:
What struck me about this one is that it is highly reminiscent of
 "genre" paintings - so perhaps, just possibly, it is some sort of stage set the couple is posing in front of...
